name: RetroRacer2D
description:
RetroRacer2D is an endless driving game. It has fancy light, pixelated art, and a retro vibe and feel to it.

-----CONTROLS-----

use the a & d keys or left & right keys to move.

-----A word from the developer-----

This is my second game i have ever made using the Unity game engine. I have improved massively in my opinion both in art and gameplay. I really hope you enjoy ; )
